comment: It is evident that he is very passionate about this course and its material. He is more focused on your learning than just giving grades. He really wishes for your success and just wants you to learn something that may help you in the future in regard to your career. Overall great professor to have and learn from! One easy group project at the end.
Inspirational class on entrepreneurship that gives you real-life solutions that are applicable to your business and industry.

Online class, scheduled virtual lectures twice per week. AMAZING professor. Genuinely cares about his students and will go the extra mile for you. Assignments are easy, exams are easy. Open book, open notes. Group project but it is about the steps to build a business and he walks you through each step. Always available if you have questions.
Literally the easiest A. Connect work, tests online, and a pretty easy group project. Take him!!

One of the greatest professors I've taken at KSU so far. He had to take over this class when the previous professor quit. He changed the syllabus so the work load wouldn't be overwhelming. Super easy class with little work. Take the in-class version with him because he teaches you a lot of real world stuff. Not your usual lectures. 5-stars!
Awesome Professor. Best at KSU. This is areal business guy not a walking textbook.

Take him for MGT 4199! He is one of the best professors in the program! The class is built around Learnsmart (a learnsmart assignment and case study each week), there is 4 easy tests in learnsmart, and a group project. Because it was late in the semester, he made the project an executive summary. Easy A! Would take again!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Would take again

comment: I highly recommend that anyone take Profesor Quinet physical class. You will not regret it, he gives real life examples of business strategies and issues in corporate industries. He was very lenient when it came down to turning in assignments.

The guy didn't communicate well, but he made up for it when there was a misunderstanding. Beyond that, the only hard thing in this class is the simulation game. Try to get a good group and figure that thing out, because it's a pretty complicated. Besides that, all of tests are on quizlet. Really Easy A if you don't miss any assignments.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--GROUP PROJECTS--Would take again

comment: Managing Your Company Online. Very straight forward, quizzes and exams in Connect. Materials initially seemed a little elementary, however nice review of ALL the different areas of business just prior to graduation. Easy going and very experienced professor.  Business Strategy Game (BSG) Simulation is new - order early !!!  requires extra code.

Professor  Quinet is a great teacher. Amazing teacher, clear, very knowledgeable, and a very nice guy. Tests and homework are all in connect. Super flexible and will work with you. I highly recommend that you take him for Strategic Management.

Strategic Management Online. Very very easy. Cases with 4-5 questions each week, 30 minute LearnSmart each week, and 4 exams. There were other two tests we had to take to analyze Coles College but counted towards our grade. Not very clear in the syllabus.   Be careful. It's easy to miss!
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Great professor! I took his Strategic Management class in the summer of 2016 and overall it was pretty easy. Professor Quinet is helpful and flexible as well. Definitely recommend!

Prof. Quinet is by favorite after 6 years years at KSU.  Amazing teacher, clear and organized, knowledgeable, and he truly cares about the success of his students, unlike many professors at KSU.  I highly recommend for the Capstone course and any other courses under him.

By far my favorite professor ever. He takes the subjects taught in the book and teaches them through real world experience. He makes the class very entertaining and tries to keep the "boring" chapters more bearable by telling funny stories. Class is very relaxed and wants all his students to be successful. Would take him for any class.
Best Prof on campus.  Not easy just super  professor.  Clear, motivating, and more knowledgeable than any textbook your will read.  If you can take him, it's a privilege!

I took this class online and I must say this class was extremely easy.However, be very careful, you can easily make a B out of an A course. Open book tests but time is very limited. Be on top of your work - read the chapters before the test so that as you read the test questions, you know where they are or which chap it is in the book. EASY A!
GREAT PROFESSOR LOTS OF GOOD STORIES AND OPEN BOOK TESTS. IF THERE IS A WORD BIGGER THAN STRONGLY THAT IS HOW MUCH YOU SHOULD TAKE HIS CLASS.

a wonderful teacher who knows his subject very well. He uses real-life experiences as a springboard to back up the lessons from the book. If you can stick with this teacher.his tests are all online and open book but be careful you must read chapters. Got an A.

An incredible professor. His class was the only class where I learned something all semester. His tests are online and are pretty easy. He always had great real life examples and is clearly  a good communicator. I would highly recommend taking any of his classes.

Great guy - uses real world experience and tells you what is really going on and not what you want to hear. Don't get too relaxed and think just because you get to use the book for the test, it's an automatic A. If you lax too much it's easy to get a B for an A class. I recommend taking him if you seriously want to learn about real stuff.

THIS GUY IS THE BOMB!!! Take Quinet for any management class you can. He knows this material inside and out and has great real-world business stories to supplement the lectures. He prob is one of the best professors I have had at SPSU. TAKE HIM!!!

I love this teacher, he is very smart, he teaches you things that you actually will need to know and use in life. He is very flexible and understand as long as you communicate with him through email. He does not make the exams so they are a little difficult bc they throw in a bunch of trick questions.

This class is very easy. He talks about his experience in business and kind of an overview of what to expect. The test are online and if you read the assigned chapters and underline vocab words and key concepts then you will get an A in his class. He also gives a 6 point curve on his test. He is GREAT!!!
VERY INTERESTING PROF,AND STRONGLY RECOMMEND HIM,BECAUSE IT'S EASY TO GET A AND HAVE A LOT OF FUN IN CLASS.
Extremely good prof..allowed the textbook to be used for tests.
Cool dude, the material is boring, but he tells stories about his encounters as an established buisness man.  Its interesting
Very Understanding Prefessor, he has a whole lot of real world experience so he knows his stuff well!!!!  I strongly recommend him!
